short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download aliexpress images & videos in one click and a quick menu of aliexpress including search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Downloads AliExpress product images and videos with single click.
AliEasy
There is no complex system in it.

▬▬▬▬ GETTING STARTED ▬▬▬▬▬

1. Install the extension by clicking the “Add to chrome” button.
2. Open an AliExpress product page.
3.Select the product.
4.Then  Click on the download buttons.

▬▬▬▬▬ FEATURES ▬▬▬▬▬


Quick Menu:
-Immidiately search button
-order menu
-Cart 
-Search product on aliexpress in one click
- Download main product images, variations images and pictures and product description
- Save images as ZIP (it’s useful to keep a clean download folder)
- Get the best quality image download.
- Support all features on AliExpress & Alibaba!
- Save time and download all images in single click.
- Open download directory after download
- Save product’s videos.
As it does not have any charge so it contains affiliates of aliexpress.Hope you will enjoy the service.
▬▬▬▬▬

Thank you.
After using  AliEasy,Please  give us a 5 star rating!
